This tutorial will help you get started with contributing to [Integration Blog](https://blog.integrationfest.in) series.

## Pre-Requisites

- [Google Drive](https://drive.google.com)
- Familiarity with [Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/authoring_basics.html)

## Authoring

Author the blog post in markdown format.

## Uploading

- Open the [Google Drive](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1do8dJdrgK-cOa02tDJueM7PoKuwKqT5M?usp=sharing) folder
- In the [Blog Writups](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/18UgrebGacbEO7wlfrTRoqBttEIx-y3Fs?usp=drive_link) subfolder, upload the Markdown `.md` file.

## Publishing

- Inform the Integration DIC team about the article, and request inclusion.
- The post would be added to the site soon.
